DOC.brief_summary: Intake omega-3 ( n-3 ) polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFAs ) fish oil fish associate significant health benefit risk cardiovascular disease . However , lean fatty fish show beneficial effect suggest effect mediate n-3 PUFAs . Krill oil n-3 PUFA supplement mark . The n-3 PUFAs krill oil form phospholipid , fatty acid may readily effectively absorb ingestion n-3 PUFAs form triacylglycerols fish oil . Fish also contain many potential health component n-3 PUFAs taurine vitamin D , iodine , selenium unspecified component bioactive peptide mediate health beneficial effect observe intake fish . The present study aim elucidate cardiovascular health beneficial effect consumption fish ( lean fatty ) krill oil , regard effect plasma lipids marker cardiovascular health inflammatory , haemostatic endothelial dysfunction marker . The investigator perform whole genome transcriptome analyse peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMCs ) order understand cardiovascular health benefit elucidate mechanisms action .
